BasicInfo.short: earthmine provides 3D street level imagery collection solutions to develop browser-based, PC, and mobile applications.

Products.name: earthmine for ArcGIS
Products.description: earthmine for ArcGIS was added to CrunchBase in 2011

Products.name: earthmine developer tools
Products.description: As of May 2008 earthmine launched 2 sets of developer tools. The first one being earthmine flash viewer API, which is a flash component

Products.name: earthmine
Products.description: earthmine will target its product to a non-consumer audience which includes companies in these areas: Engineering and Construction City

news.title: Nokia Completes Acquisition Of 3D Street-Level Imaging Specialist Earthmine
Nokia Steps Up Its Mapping-Quest, Buys Earthmine For 3D Street Level Imaging
Earthmine Aims to Index the Real World with 3D Panoramas
